author: Game Maker's Toolkit
description:
With a game idea under your belt, it's time to test it out. And the best way to do that is with a prototype. Find out why, and get tips for making your own, in episode two of Game Dev 101.

=== GMTK Games ===

🧲 Get Mind Over Magnet on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2685900/Mind_Over_Magnet/ 🧲
🔠 Get Word Play on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3586660/Word_Play 🔠

=== Sources ===

https://gamemakerstoolkit.com/sources-whats-the-point-of-prototyping/

=== Chapters ===

00:00 - Intro
02:09 - Is it fun?
04:30 - Is it viable?
05:38 - Will people like it?
07:38 - How to prototype
08:12 - Don't make it flashy
10:13 - Use other mediums
12:02 - Keep them small
13:21 - You don't have to prototype everything
16:01 - Conclusion

title: What's the Point of Prototyping?
